forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 53F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 9C. SW winds at 40 to 55 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 48F. SW winds at 25 to 35 mph, decreasing to 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Potential for heavy rainfall. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady light rain in the morning with showers continuing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 11C. Winds WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the morning, with showers continuing in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 51F. Winds WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 12C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 56F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
